entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,1,400301}I was startled when the Gauntlet gleamed{F801}during the Rite as well. It's all so{F801}very mysterious...{F801}{F802}But this "Burroughs," was it? I'm very{F801}reassured to have her guidance.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Timid Samurai\0{F87A,117}I see... True, you have only just{F801}finished your training. Be sure that{F801}you rest well, yes?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Timid Samurai\0{F87A,117}{F813,1,403042}Thinking on it, I had assumed that it{F801}would be simplicity itself to find relics{F801}in the cavern...{F801}{F802}But now we are destined for the Unclean{F801}Ones' country, which we do not know for{F801}a certainty exists, yes?{F801}{F802}I am beginning to regret the day I was{F801}chosen as a Samurai...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,-73}{F813,1,412102}Ah, warrior of light. I can sense your{F801}holy shine... the Lord's blessing{F801}emanating from you.{F801}{F802}Our Lord is surely eager for you to{F801}annihilate the Filth below.{F801}{F802}Go and defeat the demons to restore{F801}order and peace to His chosen sons{F801}of man.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403003}You do well to step so fearlessly into{F801}Naraku, my brilliant fellow Samurai.{F801}{F802}Forgive me for being forward, but if you{F801}like, I could share some knowledge on{F801}the finer points of the Samurai trade.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403003}You do well to step so fearlessly into{F801}Naraku, my brilliant fellow Samurai.{F801}{F802}Forgive me for being forward, but if you{F801}like, I could share some knowledge on{F801}the finer points of the Samurai trade.{F801}

entry.source: Ask him for advice{F801}Decline his offer{F801}
entry.target: Ask him for advice{F801}Decline his offer{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}We Samurai are charged with performing{F801}two primary roles...{F801}{F802}First, we must slay the demons that{F801}continue to appear in Naraku.{F801}{F802}"Demons" are monsters which attack humans{F801}on sight. They must be slain before they{F801}escape into the wild.{F801}{F802}Our other task relates to mystic relics.{F801}But you should ask the others further{F801}within about these.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}We Samurai are charged with performing{F801}two primary roles...{F801}{F802}First, we must slay the demons that{F801}continue to appear in Naraku.{F801}{F802}"Demons" are monsters which attack humans{F801}on sight. They must be slain before they{F801}escape into the wild.{F801}{F802}Our other task relates to mystic relics.{F801}But you should ask the others further{F801}within about these.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}Ah, what a shame. If you think better{F801}of it, I shall be here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Honest Samurai\0{F87A,116}Ah, what a shame. If you think better{F801}of it, I shall be here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,-73}{F813,1,412105}You, son of man who rejected our Lord's{F801}salvation and chose the thorned path...{F801}{F802}There can be no peace without the Lord's{F801}blessing. That is because the creator of{F801}all things is...{F801}{F802}But I need not finish that thought.{F801}So then, until the day you require us{F801}once more...{F801}

That is because the creator of{F801}all things is...{F801}{F802}But I need not finish that thought.{F801}So then, until the day you require us{F801}once more...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,-73}{F813,1,412105}You who have rejected the temptation of{F801}the demons and chosen to remain a son{F801}of man...{F801}{F802}Your kind and the demons will be separate{F801}for a time, just as are. But the day of{F801}reunion will be not long in coming.{F801}{F802}Since days of old, the sons of man have{F801}been fertile soil for the demonic.{F801}That is why we exist...{F801}

You've reached the{F801}Unclean Ones' country, they tell me.{F801}{F802}Now I've no excuses left to make...{F801}I, too, must eventually venture into{F801}the land called Tokyo.{F801}{F802}I am beginning to regret the day I was{F801}chosen as a Samurai...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Timid Samurai\0{F87A,117}There are mystic objects known as {F804,5}relics{F804,0}{F801}buried within Naraku that cannot be{F801}found aboveground.{F801}{F802}I do not know their true nature, but you{F801}lose nothing by collecting them.{F801}{F802}They are found everywhere within Naraku.{F801}Should you find any, I suggest that you{F801}hold on to them.{F801}
